resource: 1002119.derived=false 1002119.description=The Toyota Prius received the lowest number of problems per 100 vehicles among compact cars in the proprietary J.D. Power and Associates 2008-2012 Vehicle Dependability StudiesSM. 2012 study based on 31,325 consumer responses measuring problems consumers experienced in the past 12 months with three-year-old vehicles (2009 model year cars and trucks). Proprietary study results are based on experiences and perceptions of consumers surveyed October-December 2011. Your experiences may vary.
